text: Very helpful staff and lady boss, provided good advice.  Cheers.

JS Timber are a great place to buy Timber from. Shirley and Sebastian and the Office team are super friendly and very easy to deal with and also the best prices in Singapore, I highly recommend Shirley and Sebastian and they will always look after your every need. I completed my renovations due to their hypercare and super responsive nature!

Just called to ask about purchasing wood for a project I am working on. I asked if the company sells Pine Timber Products as well as the Sizes. I also asked if they knew anyone who would be able to help me. The response was an immediate and abrupt 'Cannot' followed by being hung up on. I was astonished by how rude this was and the lack of care.

I would highly un-recommend this company.
Well, on 11 of Sep 2023, the lorry driver 7161 reckless driving on TPE towards SLE nearly cos my bike to fall...

Great place for all kinds of timber, excellent Bosses( Sebastine and Delwin). I was helped by staff and workers to
Complete my project. Will revisit for my future projects. Appreciate your help JS Timber
